role_description: An Ansible role that installs qBittorrent on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs qBittorrent on nearly any platform. qBittorrent is a cross-platform free and open-source BitTorrent client. qBittorrent is a native application written in C++. It uses Boost, Qt 5 toolkit, and libtorrent-rasterbar library. Its optional search engine is written in Python.
